net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients
Class ForumItemClient

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumBaseClient
      net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumItemClient
public class ForumItemClient
extends ForumBaseClient

DAO Client which handle the DTO Result. the visibility of this class is reduces to package. the only public class is ForumFacadeClient.

Version:
$Revision: 1.15 $
Author:
Charles Gay
